datasets.name: 8323e0ea
datasets.query:
use catalog service_center; 
use schema final;

SELECT
  Branch_id,
  Final_Price,
  Model,
  Chassis_Number,
  Discount_Price,
  Service_Cost,
  Invoice_Date,
  Tags
FROM 
service_center.final.silver_sales

datasets.name: a5366840
datasets.query:
use catalog service_center;
use schema final;

SELECT
    Model,
    Branch_ID,
    Number_of_Visits,
    Number_of_Visits,
    Start_Date,
    Expected_Date,
    Actual_Date,
    Delay_Days,
    Service_Cost,
    Service_Tax,
    Total_Price,
    Delayed_Reason,
    Previous_Service_Date
FROM 
service_center.final.service_center_silver;

datasets.name: ba006617
datasets.query:

use schema final;

service_center.final.forecast_monthly_customers_past

datasets.name: 031ac726
datasets.query:
SELECT ds, yhat, yhat_lower, yhat_upper
FROM service_center.final.forecast_monthly_customers
WHERE ds > LAST_DAY(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1' MONTH)
ORDER BY ds

      ds AS forecast_month,
      yhat AS forecast,
      yhat_lower AS lower_bound,
      yhat_upper AS upper_bound

      service_center.final.forecast_branch_3_months

datasets.name: e2cbb555
datasets.query:
-- Query: Forecast_Data (last 3 months - Databricks)
SELECT DISTINCT 
    Model AS model_name,
    ds AS forecast_month,
    yhat AS forecast,
    yhat_lower AS lower_bound,
    yhat_upper AS upper_bound
FROM service_center.final.forecast_model_3_months
WHERE ds >= (
    SELECT DATE_SUB(MAX(ds), 90) 
    FROM service_center.final.forecast_model_3_months
  )
  AND :model_name = 'All' OR Model IN (
      SELECT explode(split(:model_name, ',')) AS model
  )
ORDER BY forecast_month

datasets.name: 28999c60
datasets.query:
WITH max_ds_cte AS (
    SELECT MAX(ds) AS max_ds
    FROM service_center.final.forecast_model_3_months
),

filtered_data AS (
    SELECT 
        Model,
        ds,
        DATE_TRUNC('month', ds) AS forecast_month,
        yhat,
        yhat_lower,
        yhat_upper
    FROM service_center.final.forecast_model_3_months
    WHERE 
        (
            ds BETWEEN DATE_SUB((SELECT max_ds FROM max_ds_cte), 90)
                    AND DATE_ADD((SELECT max_ds FROM max_ds_cte), 90)
        )
),

aggregated_data AS (
    SELECT
        Model AS model_name,
        forecast_month,
        AVG(yhat) AS avg_forecast,
        AVG(yhat_lower) AS avg_lower_bound,
        AVG(yhat_upper) AS avg_upper_bound
    FROM filtered_data
    GROUP BY model_name, forecast_month
),

final_output AS (
    SELECT *,
        CASE 
            WHEN forecast_month <= (SELECT max_ds FROM max_ds_cte) THEN 'Historical'
            ELSE 'Future'
        END AS data_type
    FROM aggregated_data
)

SELECT *
FROM final_output
WHERE 
    :model_name = 'All'
    OR model_name IN (SELECT explode(split(:model_name, ',')) AS model)
ORDER BY forecast_month, model_name;

datasets.name: d542c0b8
datasets.query:
WITH max_date AS (
    SELECT MAX(ds) AS max_ds
    FROM service_center.final.forecast_model_3_months
)
SELECT DISTINCT 
    Model AS model_name_last,
    ds AS forecast_month_last,
    yhat AS forecast_last,
    yhat_lower AS lower_bound_last,
    yhat_upper AS upper_bound_last,
    'Last 3 Months' AS data_period,
    NULL AS model_name_future,
    NULL AS forecast_month_future,
    NULL AS forecast_future,
    NULL AS lower_bound_future,
    NULL AS upper_bound_future
FROM service_center.final.forecast_model_3_months, max_date
WHERE ds >= DATE_SUB(max_ds, 90)
    AND ds <= max_ds
    AND (:model_names = 'All' OR Model IN (
        SELECT explode(split(:model_names, ',')) AS model
    ))
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT 
    NULL AS model_name_last,
    NULL AS forecast_month_last,
    NULL AS forecast_last,
    NULL AS lower_bound_last,
    NULL AS upper_bound_last,
    'Future' AS data_period,
    Model AS model_name_future,
    ds AS forecast_month_future,
    yhat AS forecast_future,
    yhat_lower AS lower_bound_future,
    yhat_upper AS upper_bound_future
FROM service_center.final.forecast_model_3_months, max_date
WHERE ds >= DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE_ADD(max_ds, 1))
    AND ds <= DATE('2025-12-31')  -- Extended to year-end to check for any future data
    AND (:model_names = 'All' OR Model IN (
        SELECT explode(split(:model_names, ',')) AS model
    ))
ORDER BY 
    CASE WHEN data_period = 'Last 3 Months' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END,
    forecast_month_last
